text: Hey. This has probably been spoken about a dozen of times before but is there a way to add columns in the email templates in design tools or does HubSpot limit email templates to the one column for each row? I am looking into building out a newsletter using quite a lot of content. Thanks
Ah just remembered you can split modules. I'll give that a go and see how things go.

Watch out for excess code - Gmail has a 102kb HTML limit at which point it will clip your email short.

Also, don't pack in too much content, consider creating more content specific emails and segmenting your audience.
I prefer custom coding (of course I do, I'm an email design/developer!) - leaner code and a better fit for your brand.

<@UJL4N3WN8> you are right..
i also prefer to custom coding. so the email mobile friendly. :slightly_smiling_face:
